mapper.select: SELECT id, kind, phonenum, acc, name, address, frontregisnum, afterregisnum, nickname FROM t3_account where kind = "A" ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{lastNum}

SELECT id, kind, phonenum, acc, name, address, frontregisnum, afterregisnum, nickname, resname, resnum, reskind, region, resad, resphone FROM t3_account where kind = "B" ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{lastNum}
